participant_1.name: Alex Morgan
participant_1.background: My first big purchase was my home. I realized that I have more control over my life than I thought I did. I'd love to be a pilot like my brother. I am passionate about a lot of things. I drink a cup of coffee and check my email before heading out the door.

participant_2.name: Jordan Smith
participant_2.personality: Playful, thoughtful, and a bit self-doubting.
participant_2.background: I'm 5'8", but my dog is only 20 inches tall. I get to be creative and have fun with my work. My favorite book is David Copperfield. I value my Louis Vuittons the most because they're a symbol of my success and status.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I work in the design industry. I get to be creative and have fun with my work.
That's cool! I like to be creative too. I love to write.
Oh, what kind of things do you write?
I write short stories and poems. I also write about my life experiences.
That's cool. I've always wanted to be a writer, but I'm not sure I'm good enough.
I think you're probably good enough. You just have to practice and keep writing.
Thanks for the encouragement. I'll give it a try.
You're welcome. I'm sure you'll do great.
My favorite book is David Copperfield. It's a great story about a young boy who overcomes adversity to become a successful man.
That sounds like a good book. I'll have to check it out.
You should. It's a classic for a reason.
